recipe_long_name: Dhapate, Maharashtrian Masala Flat Bread recipe - How to make Dhapate, Maharashtrian Masala Flat Bread
ingredients:
2 cups jowar (white millet) flour
 1/4 cup besan (bengal gram flour)
 1/2 tsp red chilli powder
 1 tsp roasted cumin and coriander (dhania) powder
 oil as required
 salt to taste
 lukewarm water to knead the dough
recipe:
Method
Mix all the above ingredients.
Add lukewarm water and knead into a soft dough.
Make small balls of the dough, and place it on a dusted rolling board and flatten using your hands with a continuous circular tapping motion.
Lift with both hands, and place it on the griddle.
Spread a little water on the top of the roti.
Turn the roti, and then put oil on both the sides till golden brown in colour.
Serve with curd, pickle or chutney!
tags:
Maharashtrian Rotis / Polis
Indian Rotis
Tava
Indian Travel Food Paratha
times: Preparation Time: 5 mins, Cooking Time: 30  mins, Total Time: 35 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Jaggery and Til Laddu recipe - How to make Jaggery and Til Laddu
ingredients:
1 cup sesame seeds (til)
 1 cup grated jaggery (gur)
 1 cup grated coconut
 1 tbsp milk , optional
recipe:
Method
Roast the sesame seeds til till they change color or till they become light brown.
Mix the roasted til and grated jaggery and grind in a mixer till it becomes soft.
Remove from the mixer and divide into 7-8 portions and give them a laddu shape.
If required, add 1-2 tea spoons of milk while making the laddus.
times: Preparation Time: 20 mins, Cooking Time: 0 mins , Total Time: 20 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Gongura Chutney recipe - How to make Gongura Chutney
ingredients:
2 cups chopped gongura leaves (ambada)
 salt to taste
 1 tbsp roasted and powdered peanuts
 2 tsp sugar
 1/2 tsp coriander (dhania) powder
 1/4 tsp chilli powder
 1 tbsp oil
 1 tsp mustard seeds ( rai / sarson)
 a pinch asafoetida (hing)
recipe:
Method
Heatht eh oil in a kadhai and add the mustard seed.
When the seeds crackle, add the turmeric powder, asafoetida and gongura leaves and stir continuously for 2 minutes.
Add the salt sugar,coriander and cumin seeds powder, peanut powder and chilli powder, mix well and cook for 2 minutes.
Trasnfer in a bowl and serve hot with rotis or parathas.
tags:
Maharashtrian Chutneys, Maharashtrian Pickles
different kinds of Indian chutney
Kadai Veg
Quick Chutneys
times: Preparation Time: 15 mins, Cooking Time: 10 mins, Total Time: 25 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Urad Dal With Onions recipe - How to make Urad Dal With Onions
ingredients:
2 cups urad dal (split black lentils)
 1/4 cup water
 salt to taste
 1/2 cup chopped onions
 1/2 tsp chilli powder
 1/4 tsp coriander (dhania) powder
 a pinch turmeric powder (haldi)
 a pinch asafoetida (hing)
 a few curry leaves (kadi patta)
 2 tbsp oil
 1/4 tsp mustard seeds ( rai / sarson)
recipe:
Method
Pressure cook the dal till two whistles.
When the steam escapes take out the dal from the cooker and keep aside.
Take a kadhai, put oil in it.
When oil becomes hot, put mustard seeds and when mustard seeds crackle add turmeric powder, hing , curry leaves and onion.
Then saute until they become light brown in colour.
Then add salt, chilly powder , roasted coriander powder and the cooked urad dal.
Mix well and cook for a minute.
Serve hot with chapati or jowar roti.
tags:
Maharashtrian Dal, Varan / Amti / Kalvan
 Popular Dals from all over India
Kadai Veg
Quick Dals / quick Kadhis
times: Preparation Time: 5 mins, Cooking Time: 15 mins, Total Time: 20 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Farali Bhakharwadi recipe - How to make Farali Bhakharwadi
ingredients:
To Be Blended Into A Chutney:
 50 gms peanuts
 2 tsp poppy seeds (khus-khus)
 1 tsp ginger (adrak)
 1 tsp green chillies
 1 stick cinnamon (dalchini)
 2 to 3 cloves (laung / lavang)
 1 tsp cumin seeds (jeera)
 3 to 4 cardamoms
 salt to taste
 Other Ingredients:
 500 gms boiled potatoes
 50 gms grated coconut
 1 tsp ginger (adrak) paste
 salt to taste
 1 tsp green chilli paste
 100 gms rajgira flour
 lemon juice to taste
 a pinch sugar
 1 tbsp chopped coriander (dhania)
 1 tsp sesame seeds (til)
 oil for frying
recipe:
Method
Mash the potatoes and add the salt, coriander, sesame seeds, sugar, lemon juice, ginger and green chillies paste and mix well.
Divide the mixture into small equal sized balls and roll out into small rotis, using rajgira flour.
Apply little prepared chutney to the potato roti and sprinkle coconut on top of the chutney.
Then roll the potato roti and cut in to small pieces.
Heat the oil in a kadhai, dip each piece in the rajigra flour and deep fry till they turn golden brown and crisp.
Serve hot with curds.
times: Preparation Time: 15 mins, Cooking Time: 20 mins, Total Time: 35 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Ukad recipe - How to make Ukad
ingredients:
2 cups curds (dahi)
 3 cups  water
 1/2 cup rice flour (chawal ka atta)
 3 to 4 curry leaves (kadi patta)
 1/2 tsp mustard (rai / sarson) powder
 1/2 tsp cumin seeds (jeera)
 asafoetida (hing)
 1 chopped green chilli
 2 to 3 tsp oil
 salt to taste
recipe:
First down only mix cud water and flourbeat well
Then take a kadai heat oil put all the above ingrdients one after the other
Then put the curd mixture and stir it continously so that no lumps remain
Lastly put the salt
Serve hot with little oil on it
times: Preparation Time: 5mins, Cooking Time: 10-15mins, Total Time: 20 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Maharashtra Special Bharleli Vaangi recipe - How to make Maharashtra Special Bharleli Vaangi
ingredients:
2 tsp roasted powdered peanuts
 1 tsp chilli powder
 1 tsp goda masala
 6  small sized brinjal
 3 tsp oil
 1/2 tsp cumin seeds (jeera)
 1/4 tsp mustard seeds ( rai / sarson)
 2 tsp tamarind (imli) water
 2 tsp jaggery (gur) water
 1/2 tsp coriander (dhania)
 salt to taste
recipe:
Method
Combine the coconut, peanut powder, red chilli powder, goda masala and salt in a bowl and mix well. Keep aside.
Slice the brinjals into four leaving them attached only at the stem.
Stuff them with the prepared masala and keep aside.
Heat oil in pan and add the cumin and mustard seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the stuffed brinjals. Add some water and cover and cook for 10-12 minutes.
Add the tamarind and jaggery water, salt and mix well.
Serve hot garnished with coriander and grated coconut.
times: Preparation Time: 15 mins, Cooking Time: 30 mins, Total Time: 45 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Capsicum And Onion Chutney recipe - How to make Capsicum And Onion Chutney
ingredients:
1/2 cup finely chopped capsicum
 1/4 cup finely chopped onions
 2 green chillies
 1 tbsp chopped coriander (dhania)
 salt to taste
 a pinch turmeric powder (haldi)
 1 tbsp sesame seeds (til) powder
 1 tbsp powdered peanuts
 1 tbsp oil
 For The Tempering:
 1 tbsp oil
 1/4 tsp mustard seeds ( rai / sarson)
 a pinch asafoetida (hing)
 a pinch turmeric powder (haldi)
recipe:
Method
Heat the oil in a kadhai and add the capsicum, green chilli and onions and saute for 2 minutes and cook covered stirring occasionally till it becomes soft.
Transfer in a blender and add the coriander ,salt, sesame seeds powder, groundnut powder and turmeric powder and grind roughly.
Take it out  in the serving bowl and pour tadka on it.
Make tadka using tadka ingredients.
Serve hot.
tags:
Maharashtrian Chutneys, Maharashtrian Pickles
Kadai Veg
Quick Chutneys
times: Preparation Time: 10 mins, Cooking Time: 10 mins, Total Time: 20 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Raw Mango Murabba recipe - How to make Raw Mango Murabba
ingredients:
1 cup grated mango
 1 1/2 cups sugar
 1/4 tsp cardamom (elaichi) powder
recipe:
Method
Take a heavy bottom pan and put sugar and grated mango and cook for 20 minutes stirring continuously on low flame or till the raw smell disappears.
Then put cardamom powder.
Mix well and serve or shift into the jar or bottle and store refrigerated.
times: Preparation Time: 10 mins, Cooking Time: 20 mins, Total Time: 30 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Pooran Poli/oppittu recipe - How to make Pooran Poli/oppittu
ingredients:
1 cup chana dal (split Bengal gram)
 1 1/2 cups sugar
 1 1/2 cups plain flour (maida)
 a few cardamoms (elaichi)
 2 tbsp grated coconut
 1/4 tsp turmeric powder (haldi)
 a pinch of salt
 3 tbsp sesame (til) oil
 ghee for frying required amt.
recipe:
Take a vessel seive maida with salt and turmeric, sprinkle warm water little by little and make like a chappathi dough. make a hole in the middle, pour the sesame oil cover it with the same dough and close the vessel and keep aside for 30-45 mts.
Pressure cook dal with little turmeric with enough water for 3 whistle. once it is cool drain the water completely.grind it in a mixie with the sugar into  a fine paste.
Take a pan, add 1 tbls of ghee, add the grated coconut saute for few mts then add the ground dal, elachi and cook until the dal is done and it is thick. cool the dal.
Take rice flour in a seperate plate. 
Take maida dough spread like chappathi, keep the pooran insite, make a ball and spread like thin chappathi. if the dough sticks when spreading touch with the rice flour.
Heat the tawa, spread little ghee on it and cook the chapathis.
Serve hot or cold.
times: Total Time: 0 mins , Preparation Time: 30mts   Cooking Time: 25mts

recipe_long_name: Mixed Fruit Poli recipe - How to make Mixed Fruit Poli
ingredients:
200 gms plain flour (maida)
 100 gms ghee
 salt to taste
 a pinch yellow food colour
 2 cups chopped mixed fruits (banana ,  dates,  mango ,  cherries and tutty fruity )
 2 tbsp dessicated coconut
 100 gms sugar
 1 tsp cardamom (elaichi) powder
recipe:
Method
Combine a little ghee and flour with pinch of salt and kneed to soft dough, using enough water.
Cover with wet muslin cloth and keep aside for an hour.
Heat the ghee in a kadhai, add the fruits and toss for 2 minutes.
Add the sugar and coconut, mix well and cook on a slow flame for 3 minutes.
Keep aside to cool.
Add the cardamom powder and mix well.
Take a greased sheet or banana leaf and keep aside.
Divide the dough into small equal portions and spread a portion on the banana leaf.
Place one or two tbsp of the fruit mix at the center and bring the sides together to seal the filling at the center.
Heat a tava and grease with little ghee and place a poli and cook till it turns golden brown from both the sides till done.
Serve hot with ghee and sprinkle with tutty fruity and a cherry.
Serve hot or warm.
times: Preparation Time: 20 mins, Cooking Time: 20 mins, Total Time: 40 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Tarkari Malve recipe - How to make Tarkari Malve
ingredients:
ginger (adrak) - medium size
 4 to 5 cloves (laung / lavang)
 1 1/2  inch cinnamon (dalchini)
 4 to 5 tbsp grated coconut
 1/2 cup oil
 1/2 cup fenugreek (methi) leaves
 1/4 cup chopped coriander (dhania)
 1/2 tsp turmeric powder (haldi)
 salt - according to your taste
 8 to 10 green chillies depending on your taste
recipe:
To make a paste:
Take a kadai add 1tsp oil and fry onions, 1/2 coconut, lavan, cinamon, galic, ginger together and make a paste adding corriander leaves while grinding the above and keep the paste aside.
to prepare the sabzi:
Take a pan
Heat the remaining oil
Add onions and fry well then add tomatoes and cook till the tomatoes are fully done then add all the vegetable(after chopping)and fry well ,add turmeric , salt with little water and leave till the vegetables are half done.
Then add the paste to the vegetables and cook till the vegetables are done and smell of the raw coconut goes.
Serve with chappatis or any kind of rotis naans or any kind breads.
times: Preparation Time: 10 mins, Cooking Time: 15 mins, Total Time: 25 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Rajgira Thalipeth recipe - How to make Rajgira Thalipeth
ingredients:
250 gms rajgira flour
 250 gms boiled potatoes
 coriander (dhania) leaves
 green chillies to taste
 curry leaves (kadi patta)
 1 tbsp cumin seeds (jeera)
 1/2 tbsp fennel seeds (saunf)
 salt to taste
 ghee for cooking
recipe:
Make a paste of corriander leaves, cumin seeds, green chillies, curry leaves and fennel.
Add the potatoes, salt and the paste to the flour and knead it into tight dough.
Add a little water if required.
Roll the dough into 1 cm thick roti ( sprinkle a little dry rejgirah flour while rolling if it is sticking to the roll palate).
Put the roti on a preheated tawa.
Make holes lightly in the roti and add ghee to these holes as well as to the side of the roti.
Roast it till golden brown on the lower side.
Turn it and repeat the procedure.
Serve it hot with farali chutney or alu sabzi.

recipe_long_name: Chhana Chuddi recipe - How to make Chhana Chuddi
ingredients:
1/2 cup kala chana (brown chick peas)
 2  small onions
 8 to 10  cloves garlic (lehsun)
 2 green chillies
 2 tsp garam masala
 1 tsp chilli powder
 salt to taste
 1 1/2 tbsp oil
 For Aloo poha:
 250 gms beaten rice (poha)
 1  small potato
 1  small onion
 1 green chilli
 coriander (dhania) to sprinkle
 salt to taste
 oil
 a pinch of sugar
 1/2 lemon
 For serving:
 ready made chiwda
 sev
 onions
 coriander (dhania)
 onion
 1 tomato
 3  small green brinjal (baingan / eggplant)
 8 to 10  cloves garlic (lehsun)
 2 green chillies
 1 inch of garlic (lehsun)
 salt to taste
 meat masala
recipe:
For channa
Soak channa for eight to nine hours.
Boil soaked channa in cooker till 3 to 4 whistle.
Heat oil in a pan, add small cut onions deep fry till light brown add garlic and chilli paste and add channa mirchi powder garam masala , salt 3/4 cup water and boil on low flame till 8 minutes.
For aloo poha
Heat oil and add rai, jeera hing and cut potato in small pieces and allow it cook on low flame the add onion t it,
Meanwhile soak poha for 1/2 hour then add sugar, lemon, salt, haldi to poha mix well.
Once onion and potatoes are cooked add green chilli to it and poha mixture and cook well.
Procedure for serving channa chudi
Take a plate.
Put poha in it.
Add chhana bhaji and little rasa of it.
Then put chiwda , sev , coriander and onoin to it.
Serve hot.
times: Preparation Time: 10 minutes, Cooking Time: 20 minutes, Total Time: 30 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Ridge Gourd Peels Chutney recipe - How to make Ridge Gourd Peels Chutney
ingredients:
1 cup chopped ridge gourd (turai) peel
 1 tbsp oil
 2 green chillies
 2 tbsp roasted and crushed peanuts
 1 tsp coriander (dhania) powder
 salt to taste
 1 tsp lemon juice
 a pinch turmeric powder (haldi)
 1 tsp oil for tempering
 1 tsp mustard seeds ( rai / sarson)
 a pinch asafoetida (hing)
 a pinch turmeric powder (haldi)
recipe:
Method
Take a nonstick pan and put oil in it, when oil becomes hot put ridge gourd peel and green chillies.
Cook for 10 -12 minutes on medium flame stirring continuously.
Shift this into the mixer and add peanut powder,turmeric powder, coriander powder, salt and grind to a smooth paste using little water.
Then take it out into a serving bowl
Prepare the tempering using ingredients and pour it over the chutney.
Then add lemon juice.
Serve immediately or store refrigerated.
tags:
Maharashtrian Chutneys, Maharashtrian Pickles
Mixer
Non-stick Pan
Quick Chutneys
times: Preparation Time: 10 mins, Cooking Time: 15 mins, Total Time: 25 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Ukdicha Paratha recipe - How to make Ukdicha Paratha
ingredients:
For The Dough:
 1 cup whole wheat flour (gehun ka atta)
 a pinch of salt
 water as required
 1 tbsp oil
 For The Stuffing:
 1 cup rice flour (chawal ka atta)
 1/2 cup finely chopped onions
 salt to taste
 2 tbsp finely chopped coriander (dhania)
 water as required
 2 tsp oil
 Other Ingredients:
 oil for cooking
 whole wheat flour (gehun ka atta) for rolling
recipe:
For the dough
Combine wheat flour, oil, water and salt in a deep bowl and knead to a soft dough.
Divide into 4 equal portions and keep aside.
For stuffing
In a deep pan add water and bring it to a boil, add the rice flour and mix well.
Transfer it to another bowl, add the onions, salt, coriander, oil and mix well to form a dough.
Divide the stuffing into 4 equal portions and keep aside.
How to proceed
Roll a portion of the dough into a circle using a little flour for rolling.
Place a portion of the stufifng in the centre of the circle.
Bring together all the sides in the centre and seal tightly.
Roll again into a circle using a little flour for rolling.
Heat a non-stick tava (griddle) and cook the paratha using a little oil until golden brown spots appear on both the sides.
Serve hot.
tags:
Maharashtrian Rotis / Polis
Stuffed Veg Parathas
Raksha - Bandhan
Indian Party
times: Preparation Time: 10 mins, Cooking Time: 10 mins, Total Time: 20 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Fennel Seeds Chutney recipe - How to make Fennel Seeds Chutney
ingredients:
1 cup fennel seeds (saunf)
 7 garlic (lehsun) cloves
 salt to taste
 1 1/2 tsp chilli powder
 1 tsp coriander (dhania) powder
 1/2 tsp cumin seeds (jeera)
recipe:
Method
Roast the fennel seeds for 5 to 7 minutes or till light brown in colour.
Mix all the other ingredients and grind coarsely.
Serve with rice, roti or any kind of chapati along with oil or curd.
times: Preparation Time: 5 mins, Cooking Time: 5 mins, Total Time: 10 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Vegetable Khichdi ( By Sweetzaara_20 ) recipe - How to make Vegetable Khichdi ( By Sweetzaara_20 )
ingredients:
2 cups long grained rice (basmati)
 1/2 cup masoor dal (split red lentil)
 2 onions
 oil for cooking
 1 sweet potato (shakarkand)
 1 carrot
 4 to 5 ladies finger (bhindi)
 1/2 cup green peas
 3 tsp pure ghee
 1 tsp caraway seeds (shahjeera)
 6 to 7 black peppercorns (kalimirch)
 2 to 3 bayleaves (tejpatta)
 4 to 5 cloves (laung / lavang)
 1 bayleaf (tejpatta)
 1 tomato
 1/2 tsp turmeric powder (haldi)
 1 cup coconut milk
 salt to taste
 2 tsp coriander (dhania)
recipe:
Method
Wash rice and dal and keep in water for half an hour.
Take 1 onion and slice it roundly and cut others in ti small spices.
Heat the oil and fry the round onion after that also fry sweetpotato carrot and ladyfinger and put it on a tissue paper so that extra oil can be removed
Heat oil in a pan then put shahjeeru blackpepper taj laving and tamalpatra and then put onion and cook for half min.
Then put tomato fried onion and haldi in to it
. Then put rice and masur dal and cook for five min.
Then put coconut milk and salt.
Now put sweetpotato carrot ladyfingure and greenbeans and mixed it properly and pour 3 cup of water.
Then after 3 min close the pan and cook for 10-15 min at low heat. Serve it with coriander leaves.
User comments and tips
After pilling the potatos dip it in to the salt water the potato will not become black.
times: Preparation Time: 18 mins, Cooking Time: 25 mins, Total Time: 43 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Sabudhana Kichidi recipe - How to make Sabudhana Kichidi
ingredients:
1 cup  dry sago (sabudana)
 1 cup roasted peeled peanuts crushed or powdered.
 3 to 4 green chillies, chopped
 1 potato, finely chopped
 2 tbsp chopped coriander (dhania)
 1/2 tsp cumin seeds (jeera)
 1/4 tsp sugar
 1 1/2 tsp lemon juice
 1 tbsp ghee or oil
recipe:
Wash sago gently. remove excess water. keep aside for 1 hour. loosen the sago and break lumps with figures. sprinkle a handful of water. keep aside for 1 hour. loosen as before. 
Take in a mixing bowl. add the peanuts, coconut, cumin seeds, sugar, salt and lime. mix well with hands or wooden spatula. 
Just before serving, heat oil in a non-stick sauce pan, add potatoes and stir fry till tender. add green chillies and stir. 
Add sago mixture and stir gently till uniformly mixed. cover and cook for 5 minutes on very low flame, frequently stir in between. 
When the sago grains become transparent and soft, add coriander and mix.
tags:
Gujarati  Faral, Faraal
Maharashtrian Upvas (Fasting)
collection of khichdi recipes
Mahashivaratri
Navratri Vrat
times: Preparation Time: 10, Cooking Time: 15, Total Time: 25 mins ,

recipe_name: Batata Vada(maharashtrain Style Of Potato Vada)
recipe_long_name: Batata Vada(maharashtrain Style Of Potato Vada) recipe - How to make Batata Vada(maharashtrain Style Of Potato Vada)
ingredients:
2  large potatoes
 1  large onion
 3 green chillies
 1/2  " ginger (adrak)
 1 tbsp coriander (dhania)
 1 tbsp powdered peanuts
 1 tbsp grated coconut
 1/2 tbsp lemon juice
 salt to taste
 1/2 tsp sugar
 1 cup besan (Bengal gram flour)
 a pinch turmeric powder (haldi)
 a pinch asafoetida (hing)
 a pinch baking soda
 salt to taste
 1/2 tsp chilli powder
 oil for frying
recipe:
Boil, peel and mash potatoes.
Roast and powder ground nuts coarsely.
Saute the onion until soft
Mix potatoes,onion, ground nuts, coconut and all the other ingredients into a dough. make small balls and set aside.
Mix the batter ingre. with 2tsp of very hot oil.
Heat oil, dip the potato balls in the batter and deep fry.
Serve sizzling hot with coconut chutney or tomato ketchup.
times: Total Time: 0 mins , Preparation Time: 15mts   Cooking Time: 20mts

recipe_long_name: Red Garlic Chutney recipe - How to make Red Garlic Chutney
ingredients:
1 cup grated coconut
 6 to 7  cloves garlic (lehsun), crushed
 3  small red chillies
 1 tsp tamarind (imli) pulp
 1 tsp oil
 salt to taste
recipe:
Heat the oil in a saucepan and saute the garlic and red chillies for 1/2 minute.
Add the coconut and stir for 1 more minute.
Cool and grind to a coarse paste with the tamarind and salt using a little water.
Refrigerate till ready to serve.

Mixer
Quick Chutneys
times: Preparation Time: 10, Total Time: 10 mins ,     Cooking Time: ---

recipe_long_name: Drumstick Leaf Upkari recipe - How to make Drumstick Leaf Upkari
ingredients:
4 cups drumstick leaves (saragva bhaji)
 1 tsp oil
 1/2 tsp mustard seeds ( rai / sarson)
 2 broken whole dry kashmiri red chillies
 a pinch of asafoetida (hing)
 1 cup finely chopped onions
 1 tsp crushed garlic (lehsun)
 salt to taste
 3 tbsp boiled moong (whole green gram) dal
 2 finely chopped green chillies
 1/4 tsp turmeric powder (haldi)
 1 tbsp freshly grated coconut
recipe:
Method
Heat oil in a kadhai and add the mustard seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the red chillies and saute for 10 seconds.
Add the garlic and onions and salt and saute till the onions turn translucent.
Add the green chillies and the drumstick leaves and little water enough for the leaves to get cooked and mix well.
Cover and cook for 7 minutes.
Add the moong dal, turmeric powder and saute till the mixture becomes dry.
Add the coconut and asafoetida and mix well.
Serve hot.
tags:
South Indian Curries / Sabzis
Maharashtrian Bhaji
Leafy Vegetable Sabzis
Low Cal Subzis
Quick Sabzis
times: Preparation Time: 15 mins, Cooking Time: 8 mins, Total Time: 23 mins ,

recipe_long_name: Sabo Dana Khichdi recipe - How to make Sabo Dana Khichdi
ingredients:
250 gms sago (sabudana)
 1  large potato
 1  large onion
 1 carrot
 50 gms peanuts
 50 ml oil
 2 to 3 red chillies
 mustard seeds ( rai / sarson)
 cumin seeds (jeera)
 chana dal (split Bengal gram)
 salt to taste
recipe:
Boil 4 glasses of water.  soak saboodana in the hot water for 5 minutes.  drain the water and keep the saboo dana aside. 
Heat kadai and pour oil.  put red chillies, rai, jeera and chana dal in the hot oil. add peanuts and fry. add chopped onions, potatoes and carrot and fry till cooked. add saboo dana and mix well.  garnish with coriander leaves and grated carrot.  serve it hot with dahi.
tags:
Maharashtrian Bhaat (Rice)
collection of khichdi recipes
times: Preparation Time: 30 mins, Cooking Time: 15mins, Total Time: 45 mins ,
